name: Adventure Jam 2017 - May 2017
description:
This game was made by myself over the course of a week for the 2017 Adventure Jam.

The aim of the game is to be accept a quest, given by a man sitting outside his house to find Bob and gain a sword.

I used this jam to attempt to better my skills at creating game ready 3d assets in a short space of time and to sharpen up on my coding abilities. Unfortunately I didn't get as far as I had liked however I feel that I learnt a lot of valuable skills during this jam.

@CharlieKinglake
